widgets.name: assignment
widgets.description: A duty assignment widget. Also provides optional expiry and fallback assignee options.

widgets.name: buildstatus
widgets.description: A builder state widget for your continuous integration tool (i.e. Jenkins).

widgets.name: builderlist
widgets.description: A builder list widget for your continuous integration tool (i.e. Jenkins).

widgets.name: fatlist
widgets.description: A list widget with a wider stature.

widgets.name: fatnumber
widgets.description: A number widget with a wider stature.

widgets.name: informednumber
widgets.description: A number widget for metrics that lack meaningfulness without additional context.

widgets.name: knob
widgets.description: Simple Django Dashing widget to display a knob chart. Using jQuery Knob.

widgets.name: linklist
widgets.description: A list of messages with clickable links.

widgets.name: numberchange
widgets.description: Modified version of the default django-dashing number widget where value is compared to a previous value. Change is indicated through an icon.

widgets.name: sizednumber
widgets.description: A number widget with the power of dynamic font sizing.

widgets.name: weather
widgets.description: Simple Dashing widget to display weather info. Uses Yahoo's weather API.
